bug.author: johngrabner
bug.summary: Model class API / predict / gradient update
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://keras.io/models/model/>https://keras.io/models/model/</denchmark-link>
and <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model#predict>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model#predict</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Documentation for model predict says "batch_size: Integer or None. Number of samples per gradient update.", but unless I'm missing something, there are no gradient updates while predicting.

comments.comment: Thanks! This is already updated in the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model?version=nightly#predict>nightly version</denchmark-link> .
